items.sentence: Tom wanted to know why Mary wasn't allowed to do that.
Tom was sitting in that chair over there this morning.
Unfortunately, our conversation came to an abrupt end.
I'd like to make use of this opportunity to thank you.
I left my toolbox in the basement next to the furnace.
I love writing in the sand whenever I go to the beach.
I like listening to music when I'm not doing anything.
I lost track of all time during our walk in the woods.
I wanted to invite you, but your friend beat me to it.
Tom was planning on going until Mary asked him not to.
